Select Attractions
Have more magical adventures
London Eye
Fly 135m into the sky on the London Eye and enjoy amazing 360¬∞ views of the city! Spot Big Ben, Tower Bridge, and more ‚Äî a fun adventure for the whole family.
FIND OUT MORE
Madame Tussauds London
Meet your favourite stars like never before! Get up close to over 150 amazingly lifelike figures ‚Äî from movie heroes and pop stars to TV icons and beloved characters. Snap a selfie and step into the spotlight, all under one magical roof!
FIND OUT MORE
London Dungeon*
With 12 scarily true stories and a thrilling ride, see, hear, feel (and yes‚Ä¶ even smell) the sights and sounds of London‚Äôs darkest history. Hilarious live characters guide you through this uniquely spooky and fun-filled attraction. *Not suitable for children under 5 years old
FIND OUT MORE
Big Bus Tour
See iconic London landmarks with this 1 day hop on hop off, open-top double-decker bus sightseeing tour around the heart of London.
BOOK NOW

FIND OUT MORE
How to find us?
Shrek's Adventure! London is located on the Southbank next to SEA LIFE London Aquarium and the London Eye - with Madame Tussauds only a short 8 minute tube journey away
There's also plenty of family friendly places to eat and drink nearby, whether you're looking for a quick bite or a sit-down meal.
Already have a multi-attraction ticket?
It is essential to pre-book your visit date and timeslot before you visit each attraction. You can book it through our booking portal link below.
Reserve your timeslot
Multi-attraction Ticket FAQs
Why should I purchase a multi-attraction ticket online instead of at the attraction?
Purchasing tickets online offers several benefits:
Cost Savings: Multi-attraction combo tickets are cheaper online compared to buying individual tickets at the attraction
Guaranteed Entry: When you purchase tickets online, you can select your preferred time slot, ensuring you have a spot reserved. Walk-up tickets are subject to availability and may sell out, especially during peak times
Convenience: Skip the ticket lines and head straight to the attractions, saving you time and making your visit smoother and more enjoyable.
How much can I save with a multi-attraction ticket?
Multi-attraction passes provide substantial savings when you combine London's best attractions into one ticket, with savings rising over 70%. Essentially, the more attractions you visit, the greater your savings!
For example, purchasing five attractions separately at the door can cost up to ¬£198 per adult. With a 5-Attraction Pass priced from just ¬£59, each attraction is only¬†¬£11.80,¬†saving you ¬£140‚Äîor 70% off the full price*.
Buying online in advance always offers the best value for your visit, as on-the-day prices can fluctuate based on demand, so savings may vary.
*Pricing is accurate when listed and subject to updates.
Can I buy multi-attraction tickets at the door?
Yes, you can buy combo tickets at the door. However, please note:
Limited Availability: While we do offer multi-attraction tickets at the door, we cannot guarantee entry if time slots are fully booked.¬†To avoid disappointment, we strongly recommend purchasing your tickets online in advance.
Why do I need to reserve a timeslot to other attraction(s)?
This is to ensure you have guaranteed entry to your chosen attraction(s) as each attraction has limited capacity and operate at a first come first serve basis. To avoid disappointment, please reserve your timeslot(s) via our Booking Portal at your earliest convenience.
How do I reserve my timeslot to other attraction(s)?
You can reserve a timeslot to other attraction(s) via our Booking Portal. You can reschedule your booking up to 3 times from the date you visit Shrek's Adventure! London.
I have already booked a timeslot when I purchased the ticket, why do I need to reserve a timeslot again?
The timeslot you reserved at the time of booking is for Shrek's Adventure! London only.
Please ensure you log into your account and book a free timed-entry ticket before you visit each attraction, all you need is the confirmation number and email address used for the ticket order.
>> Log in to manage your booking here
Does your pass include Big Bus?
Big Bus tickets do not require timed entry. You can simply show your ticket at any time within 90 days of visiting Shrek's Adventure! London.
I can't see any availability on the date and/or time that I would like to visit, what can I do?
Your ticket remains valid for 90 days starting from the date of your visit to Shrek's Adventure! London. To ensure your preferred time slots, we advise booking in advance, especially during peak periods like weekends and school holidays, as availability may change. Please note that peak times tend to fill up quickly, so anticipate limited availability if you attempt to reschedule close to these busy periods.
I cannot visit at the original date and/or time anymore, can I reschedule my visit(s)?
Yes - just head over to our Booking Portal. You have the flexibility to reschedule your booking up to 3 times at no additional cost. Once logged in, you can easily view the remaining number of amendments allowed for your booking.
*Savings based on purchasing adult standard tickets separately at the attraction or walk-up.
Privacy Preference Center
When you visit any website, it may store or retrieve information on your browser, mostly in the form of cookies. This information might be about you, your preferences or your device and is mostly used to make the site work as you expect it to. The information does not usually directly identify you, but it can give you a more personalized web experience. Because we respect your right to privacy, you can choose not to allow some types of cookies. Click on the different category headings to find out more and change our default settings. However, blocking some types of cookies may impact your experience of the site and the services we are able to offer.
More information
Allow All
Manage Consent Preferences
Strictly Necessary Cookies
Always Active
These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms. You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site will not then work. These cookies do not store any personally identifiable information.
Performance Cookies
Performance Cookies
These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site. All information these cookies collect is aggregated and therefore anonymous. If you do not allow these cookies we will not know when you have visited our site, and will not be able to monitor its performance.
Functional Cookies
Functional Cookies
These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalisation. They may be set by us or by third party providers whose services we have added to our pages. If you do not allow these cookies then some or all of these services may not function properly.
Targeting Cookies
Targeting Cookies
These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant adverts on other sites. They do not store directly personal information, but are based on uniquely identifying your browser and internet device. If you do not allow these cookies, you will experience less targeted advertising.
